Key Match Events: Qazim Laci scored the first goal for Albania in the 11th minute
Andrej Kramaric scored the first goal for Croatia in the 74th minute
Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal for Croatia in the 76th minute
Klaus Gjasula scored the equalizer for Albania in the 90'+5' minute
Post-Match Reflections: Andrej Kramaric commented on the thrilling nature of the match
Klaus Gjasula expressed hope for Albania's upcoming game against Spain
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Volksparkstadion in Hamburg, Germany
The referee for the match was Francois Letexier
Others: The match was part of the Group Stage of the 2024 European Championship
The result left both Croatia and Albania with a single point after their opening two matches
Both teams are effectively needing to win their last group games on Monday if they are to progress into the knockout stage
